cosine distance.from sentence: We saw that cosine distance on adversarial and virtual adversarial training ( 0.159-0.331 ) were much smaller than ones on the baseline and random perturbation method ( 0.244-0.399 ) .

our proposed method.from sentence:
shows the test performance on the Elec and RCV1 datasets .
We can see our proposed method improved test performance on the baseline method and achieved state of the art performance on both datasets , even though the state of the art method uses a combination of CNN and bidirectional LSTM models .

Elec and RCV1 datasets.from sentence: Our unidirectional LSTM model improves on the state of the art method and our method with a bidirectional LSTM further improves results on RCV1 .

Adversarial training.from sentence:
shows test performance on the Rotten Tomatoes dataset .
Adversarial training was able to improve over the baseline method , and with both adversarial and virtual adversarial cost , achieved almost the same performance as the current state of the art method .

only virtual adversarial training.from sentence: However the test performance of only virtual adversarial training was worse than the baseline .
